# 기초통계분석
## 기술통계
```{r}
library(MASS)
data("Animals")
head(Animals)
summary(Animals)
str(Animals)
```

### 새로운 패키지 다운로드
```{r}
# install.packages("Hmisc")
library(Hmisc)
data(mtcars)
head(mtcars)
str(mtcars)
drat <- mtcars$drat
disp <- mtcars$disp
plot(drat, disp)
cor(drat, disp)


```
